faq.title: Your questions... we answer them clearly
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before ordering, we've gathered it here briefly and transparently

q1.question: How long does package preparation and delivery take?
q1.answer: Depends on the chosen package type, and duration will be determined accurately after order review.

q2.question: Can package content be modified?
q2.answer: Yes, simple modifications can be made within the package scope after technical team review.

q3.question: What payment options are available?
q3.answer: You can pay in cash, via bank transfer, or using a credit card.

q4.question: Does the price include installation and delivery?
q4.answer: Yes, the price includes installation and delivery unless otherwise stated.

q5.question: Can we contact the team before ordering?
q5.answer: Yes, you can contact us before ordering to clarify any details or inquiries.
